pages.text: It is my duty that I only say the truth about God, I have brought you clear proof from your Master, so send the children of Israel with me
He (Pharaoh) said: if you brought a miracle, then bring it if you are truthful
So he threw down his cane and it turned into a visible serpent
And he took out his hand (from his vest) and it was white to the viewers
The assembly of Pharaoh’s people said: he is a knowledgeable magician
He wants to drive you out of your land, so what do you instruct
They said: put him and his brother off (for a while) and send gatherers to the cities
to bring you every knowledgeable magician
The magicians came to Pharaoh and said: is there any reward for us if we are the winners
He said: yes, and you shall be of the close ones (to me)
They said: Moses, do you throw or are we the throwers
He said: you throw. So when they threw, they bewitched people’s eyes and frightened them and they brought a great magic
And We revealed to Moses: throw your cane, and it suddenly swallows whatever they fake
So the truth was proved and whatever they were doing was invalidated
So they were defeated there, and they turned belittled
And the magicians fell, showing humbleness
